question: Which Metro rail service in India has become the second largest operational metro rail network in the country?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Telangana recently flagged off the stretch of Hyderabad Metro between Hyderabad and its sister city Secunderabad. With this, Hyderabad Metro has become the second largest operational metro rail network in the country, only after the Delhi Metro Rail.
Hyderabad Metro is also the biggest metro project in the world in Public Private Partnership (PPP) mode, with a total project cost of â‚¹20,000 crore, constructed by Larsen & Toubro.
